item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, February 13, 2025 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:

22. What happens to your online accounts when you die? (82 points | 34 comments)
23. Federal data is disappearing. On Thursday, meet the teams working to rescue it (21 points | discuss)

25. Vanishing Culture: Punch Card Knitting (102 points | 20 comments)
26. Why cryptography is not based on NP-complete problems (67 points | 31 comments)

28. Visualizing data is an art (129 points | 52 comments)
29. A drill bit that can also drive screws (60 points | 92 comments)
30. Automated Capability Discovery via Foundation Model Self-Exploration (51 points | 13 comments)
